message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $800000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and potential returns.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $650000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After reconsidering, I'm willing to sell it to you for $725000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and potential returns.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $680000.
Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $700000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and potential returns.
